          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Food 3</string>
            <string language="en">Food 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nourriture 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alimento 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alimento 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρόφιμα 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alimento 3</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you learn more food words. Contains both sound and text.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">Here you learn more food words. Contains both sound and text. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">food</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>

            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier erlernen Sie mehr Nahrungsmittelwörter. 
Enthält Ton und Text. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben 
für Anfänger - Modul 2 - wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici que vous apprenez plus de mots de 
nourriture. Contient le bruit et le texte. Safir - 
l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - module 2 - combien 
coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você aprende mais palavras do alimento. 
Contem  o som e o texto. Safir - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para novatos - módulo 2 - quanto é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui imparate più parole dell'alimento. 
Contiene sia il suono che il testo. Safir - inglese e vita
attiva per i principianti - modulo 2 - quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ μαθαίνετε περισσότερες λέξεις τροφίμων. 
Περιέχει και τον ήχο και το κείμενο. Safir - 
αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2
- πόσο είναι αυτή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted aprende más palabras del alimento. 
Contiene el sonido y el texto. ¿Safir - inglés y vida 
laboral para los principiantes - módulo 2 - cuánto es él?</string>
          </description>
